TheWord.Title: God where ever You go, I hope You will go with Me; where ever I go, I hope I will go with You. Thank You LORD for serving Your will today, for accomplishing Your will in Me. Forever, Your hope, is all I care.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Pleasonton Bart Station, Owens Road, Dougherty/Hopyard Road, Stoneridge Road (Write: Notice an orange shirted lady across the hall and I remember Stoneridge Road.). Todai Restaurant Pleasanton 2249 Stoneridge Mall Pleasanton CA 94588 Tel: (925) 460-9100 Fax: (925) 460-9101 www.TODAI.com. Upper Level 17 Purple Lot C. Urine: Left elbow. Serving: From the right towards the left. Sip the cold water and notice the straw is a product of Houston Texas, substitute the cold water and ice for no ice. 2nd Serving 9 items: God where ever You go, I hope You will go with Me; where ever I go, I hope I will go with You. 3rd Serving 11 items: The fatal 4th item, a grilled salmon roll, will fall into the serving trail. That's Your serving LORD, that's Your serving LORD. 4th Serving includes 3 carrots: Thank You LORD for serving Your will today, for accomplishing Your will in Me (Record: bug crawls around the center right border of the left computer, Comfort.). 1st Faeces: Right ankle vibrates, (ra) excreate, the 4th and 5th letters in an 8 letter word. Miso Soup. Drink a full glass of water without ice. Noodles serving: right fingers numb. Fruits serving: Water melon, 3 oranges, cantaloupe (ask the waitress for the name of cantaloupe item). Take 2 knives but replace a knife with a fork, the knives are in the NorthCenter tray, the 3 left fingers are numb. Crepe serving with banana topping. 2nd Faeces: Running stomach, cutoff the right side of the toilet roll and throw the used toilet roll on the back tray of the toilet seat. Drink a full glass of water without ice. Throwup as I walk through the parking lot. Return to the Todai Restaurant to cleanup. 3rd Faeces: Running stomach, the right fingers are numb. 4th Faeces: Running stomach at Bayfair Bart Station. Fault at the train track on Dustberry Way between Peralta and Hansen Avenue. On Cedar Blvd between Thornton Avenue and Port Sailwood Drive observe an orange butterfly, and a $1 bill will fall down at the intersection of Cedar Blvd and Port Sailwood Drive.

ClassAssociates.Commentary: Floppy Disk Drive Noise ... Ow(ne)ens. Dougherty(/)?. Serving Noodles, right fingers numb (keyboard error.).
